alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 12:11PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, East Juliette, Dames Ferry, West Macon, Macon, Clinchfield, Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Towaliga River near Juliette. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Minor flooding expands into woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage on Monticello Highway or Georgia Highway 83. Portions of Byars Road and numerous private access roads near the river will flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 18 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EDT Thursday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18 feet on 11/12/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
